attributes.action: Atleast Keep two velanta's in the Railway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What i am looking for is to keep the Velanta engines in the HSTs(High Speed Train) The Velanta Engines are the orginal engines for the HSTs. And by 2010 there will be none left.

If you want to Keep atleast two Velanta Engines for the HST's Please sign.

Thank You.
